properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Stayed upon Jehovah Hearts are fully blest Finding as He promised Perfect peace and rest{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Like a river glorious Is God's perfect peace Over all victorious In its bright increase Perfect yet it floweth Fuller every day Perfect yet it groweth Deeper all the way{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Hidden in the hollow Of His blessed hand Never foe can follow Never traitor stand Not a surge of worry Not a shade of care Not a blast of hurry Touch the Spirit there{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Every joy or trial Falleth from above Traced upon our di-al By the Son of Love We may trust Him fully All for us to do They who trust Him wholly Find Him wholly true{/lang-eng}
